name: Exodus Saga
description:
Galaxy is a dangerous place. Help to save mankind from raging asteroids... Again?

Countless sequels, endless replay-ability.

Awful Summer Jam 2018 entry.

[Unnecessary sequels]

How to Play:

Gather asteroid debris by getting close to them. Avoid asteroids  hitting  your planet by rotating the star system .

Once resources are collected, mankind will shoot for the stars.!Literally. They will settle on another planet and wait for a sequel.

Features:

Random solar systems.

Random asteroids.

Random sequels.

Random planets names and more.
